name: Ancient Defender
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Both parts required for this process can be found in Albtraum #L "Empty Ancient Device" "267709" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Defender" "267711" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Empty Ancient Device + Crystalised Memories of a Defender = #L "Ancient Defender" "267627" Skills: | 1250 CL | Note: You can upgrade this item with a #L "Dust Brigade Notum Infuser" "274552" The recipe can be found here: #L "Infused Ancient Defender" "/tell recipe 628"
